item.description:
Dare to drive to Stamford you meetup singles. This is our mid week singles mixed VIP group party. Our Pre- Turkey party- doors open 7:30pm ,8:00pm dance lesson=then mingle, network and bring your favorite holiday wine to share. Our fun sexy dance lesson to meet everyone, all levels- I will mix all kinds of music. I am offering this to another fun meetup group,and some of my clients- this will be fun mingle with a great  mix of people.  Diner after.

 

$15 admission-all welcome

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Mid Week Single ALmost thanksgiving at my dance studio
